--------------------
Text: Trzy Korony (English: Three Crowns , Slovak: "Tri koruny" ) is the summit of the Three Crowns Massif, an independent portion of a range called Pieniny Mountains in the south of Poland.
Triplets:<Trzy Korony
1:
--------------------
Text: Trzy Korony:  Trzy Korony forms the central part of a compact group of connected mountains known as Pieniny Środkowe, consisting mainly of the limestone and dolomite rock strata.
Triplets:<Trzy Korony
2:
--------------------
Text: Trzy Korony:  Trzy Korony is located within the Pieniny National Park in Lesser Poland Voivodeship.
